sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SYNODICAL, ſomething belonging to a ſynod. Thus, ſynodical epiſtles are circular letters written by the ſynods to the abſent prelates and churches ; or even theſe general ones directed to all the faithful, to inform them of what had passed in the ſynod.
